# 区间合并

[AcWing-803-区间合并](https://www.acwing.com/solution/AcWing/content/1590/)

## 实现

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
typedef pair<int, int> PII;
vector<PII> merge(vector<PII> &seg)
{
    vector<PII> res;
    sort(seg.begin(), seg.end());
    int beg = -2e9, end = -2e9;
    for(auto e : seg)
    {
        if(end < e.first)
        {
            if(beg != -2e9) res.push_back({beg, end});
            beg = e.first, end = e.second;
        }
        else
            end = max(end, e.second);
    }
    if(beg != -2e9) res.push_back({beg, end});
    return res;
}
int main()
{
    int n;
    scanf("%d", &n);
    vector<PII> seg;
    for(int i = 1, l, r; i <= n; ++ i)
    {
        scanf("%d%d", &l, &r);
        seg.push_back({l, r});
    }
    vector<PII> res = merge(seg);
    printf("%d\n", res.size());
    return 0;
}
```
